com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class DacOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.DacOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, DacOperations

    public class DacOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, DacOperations
    Includes operations for importing and exporting Azure SQL Databases into and out of Azure blob storage.

    • Method Summary

        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server in which the database to export resides.

      • getStatusAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<DacGetStatusResponse> getStatusAsync(java.lang.String serverName,
                                                               java.lang.String fullyQualifiedServerName,
                                                               java.lang.String username,
                                                               java.lang.String password,
                                                               java.lang.String requestId)
        Gets the status of the import or export operation in the specified server with the corresponding request ID. The request ID is provided in the responses of the import or export operation.
        Specified by:
        getStatusAsync in interface DacOperations
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the server in which the import or export operation is taking place.
        fullyQualifiedServerName - Required. The fully qualified domain name of the Azure SQL Database Server where the operation is taking place. Example: a9s7f7s9d3.database.windows.net
        username - Required. The administrator username for the Azure SQL Database Server.
        password - Required. The administrator password for the Azure SQL Database Server.
        requestId - Required. The request ID of the operation being queried. The request ID is obtained from the responses of the import and export operations.
        Returns:
        Represents a list of import or export status values returned from GetStatus.

      • getStatus

        public DacGetStatusResponse getStatus(java.lang.String serverName,
                             java.lang.String fullyQualifiedServerName,

                                      java.net.URISyntaxException
        Gets the status of the import or export operation in the specified server with the corresponding request ID. The request ID is provided in the responses of the import or export operation.
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface DacOperations
        Parameters:
        serverName - Required. The name of the server in which the import or export operation is taking place.
        fullyQualifiedServerName - Required. The fully qualified domain name of the Azure SQL Database Server where the operation is taking place. Example: a9s7f7s9d3.database.windows.net
        username - Required. The administrator username for the Azure SQL Database Server.
        password - Required. The administrator password for the Azure SQL Database Server.
        requestId - Required. The request ID of the operation being queried. The request ID is obtained from the responses of the import and export operations.
        Returns:
        Represents a list of import or export status values returned from GetStatus.

        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Thrown if there was an error parsing a URI in the response.
